document.full_text: is global warming to blame for record snowfall in the usa this year? jeff masters, director of meteorology for the weather underground, a private weather service, thinks so and will be around to answer your global warming questions, starting at 1 p.m. et.
document.title: join a live chat on global warming at 1 p.m. et
